title: Talon plz add silence buff again
body:
Riot, please add Talons silence back. He is my favourite character and through research I learned he used to have a silence. Without it he is normal but with it he stood out from the rest because no other assassin had a silence abilty.

Wjchoi, and all other Talon supporters

replies.body:
LB kass....yup no other assassin had a silence and that made talon special. not broken OP and all silences were getting removed from assassins.....

good research you did....newbie.
Why should a Champion that can already 100-0 you get the ability to stop you from fighting back?

Yeah bring it back! I enjoyed laning against someone that could instantly kill you the second you moved away from your tower!!! Don't forget that the silence made it impossible to escape!!! Haha! Fun!

I agree, talon's silence was not as broken as leblanc or kass' since they could burst someone then blink away 10000000 metres so that you never catch them, all talon has is breif stealth, which is a big part of his combo anyway.

Or at least a different CC for talon then slow, jeez the only way to make that work in the new meta is to make him do health based damage or armor shred on his e. Also the name cutthroat should be changed since the name does not fit with the ability anymore, its more of a hamstring sever more then anything now.

unfortunately that wont happen, old talon could 100/0 kill anything squishy without them dashing, using something like a kayle ult or using zhonyas, I main talon and have since I started league but he probably wont get it back, though the 99% solw for 0.25 secs in just insulting and not needed since he already has a slow
Just build Leona as an assassin. Stuns, baby.

Actually several other assassins have had silences.

But it is ridiculous to play against, and Riot doesn't want assassins to have silences.
As it currently stands most anyone who gets into a fight can barely fight back against Talon, and they couldn't get away if they tried, it was worse when he had the silence.

Leblanc used to have a silence too so he wasn't the only one, and I'm pretty sure it was because he stood out from the rest that they took it away, tall poppy syndrome and all that.

but personally i liked him with a silence.

Yes he wasn't broken he had to get into the fight to silence where as Kass could do it from range same with LB it was disappointing when they removed it he is my favorite assassin as well but now they can flash or Zhoyna's his combo unlike Zed he can kill without ult but his cd is higher then Zeds q and e so it is a bit annoying now
